title: Pixel 4a - How do I change the restriction on my bank apps
content: I have a bank app. I want to be notified of all activity on my card. However, when I go into settings it shows 'Notifications' ~ All notifications. But I am not getting notified. I've check the 'do not disturb' and that is clear.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
